article_title: Obama Pounds The Table To Distract Attention From His Lawbreaking

article_metadata.description: Two federal courts have found the law is clear, and the president is on the wrong side of it. The president would rather that you not focus on that small detail.
article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: Two federal courts have found the law is clear, and the president is on the wrong side of it. The president would rather that you not focus on that small detail.
og.title: King v. Burwell: Obama Pounds The Table To Distract Attention From His Lawbreaking
